title: PhonePe vs Salesforce | Offer Evaluation
content:
I have two competing offers. Please help me choose one!
Years of Experience: 3.5 years


Company: Salesforce
Team: Service cloud
Title/Level: MTS
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 35,00,000 INR (including employer's PF: 1,68,000 INR)
Joining Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: 52,000 USD over 4 years
Performance Bonus: 10% of Salary ( 3,50,000 INR )
TC (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~49,00,000 (considering 10% performance bonus)
Comments: Not sure of team and work quality. 


Company: PhonePe
Title/Level: Software Engineer (Flat heirarchy)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: ~32,00,000 (including employer's PF: ~16,000)
Joining Bonus: 4,00,000 INR
Stock bonus: 24,00,000 INR ESOPs over 4 years
Performance Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~38,00,000 INR
Comments: Team and work here seems to be good. Buy backs - only 25% of last year's vested can be used in buy back. Not sure of IPO. 


I'm thinking about Learning opportunities, Work quality, Career growth, WLB, PhonePe's IPO, etc.

title: Amazon || Contract SDE-L4 || Bangalore
content:
This is the compensation breakdown for a SDE **contract** role at Amazon. The contract is for **12 months**. This is a direct hiring from Amazon, **not** a 3rd party hiring. Amazon has recently started this trend of hiring contract SDE roles. Its kind of an internship for experienced folks.

Education: B.Tech from tier 1 college (NIT)
Years of Experience: 3 months
Prior Experience: 1year
Date of the Offer: Sept, 24
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE 1
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 20 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1.5 Lakh
Stock bonus: NA (no stocks in contract role)
Bonus: NA 
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 21.5 LPA
Benefits: You get all the benefits of a normal Amazon employee(Leaves, meal benefits, etc)
Other details:

title: Zepto | SDE2 | Offer | Need help
content:
Education: Tier-3
Years of Experience: 3 years+
Current Experience: SDE 2(Product based company - Ecommerce)
Current salary: 39 LPA (26 LPA base , 4.5LPA performance ,8.5 LPA Esops)

Date: Oct
Company: Zepto
Title/Level: Software engineer II
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 42 LPA
Joining bonus : 3 Lakhs
ESOPS : 40 lakhs for 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 55Lakhs (first year)

Have good wlb and wfh option in the current company whereas Zepto has 5 days WFO and not so good wlb. Should I join?
